basics.name: Cristian Abrante
basics.label: Data Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate Data Engineer with a strong foundation in data science, shaped by diverse international experiences. Currently contributing at Alohas.com, where I design and implement scalable data and analytics architectures to drive business insights and decision-making.

work.name: ALOHAS
work.summary: Designing and implementing scalable data and analytics architectures to drive business insights and decision-making.
highlights: Built data infrastructure and pipelines for analytics platforms
Designed scalable data architectures supporting business growth
Implemented data solutions enabling data-driven decision-making

work.name: Foodello - Fiksuruoka.fi
work.summary: Data engineering role focused on building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure.
highlights: Developed and maintained data pipelines using dbt and Dagster
Implemented data transformations in Snowflake data warehouse
Built infrastructure as code using Terraform on GCP
Created business intelligence dashboards using Tableau

work.name: Unity Technologies
work.summary: Software engineering role working with data engineering technologies and distributed systems.
highlights: Built data pipelines using Apache Spark and Apache Druid for large-scale data processing
Implemented data transformations and models using dbt and Snowflake
Developed workflow orchestration solutions with Apache Airflow
Managed cloud infrastructure on GCP using Terraform

work.name: Unity Technologies
work.summary: Software engineering internship focused on web development and API design.
highlights: Developed JavaScript and TypeScript applications
Implemented automated testing using Jest
Designed and documented APIs using OpenAPI Specification

work.name: Aalto University
work.summary: Graded student assignments in Methods of Data Mining course taught by PhD Wilhelmiina Hämäläinen, providing feedback and ensuring fair grading.
highlights: Graded assignments for Methods of Data Mining course
Provided constructive feedback to students
Collaborated with PhD Wilhelmiina Hämäläinen

work.name: ATECRESA
work.location: San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Canary Islands, Spain
work.summary: Designed and developed a scalable e-commerce platform for the restaurant sector in the Canary Islands.
highlights: Designed and developed scalable e-commerce platform
Built solutions for restaurant sector in Canary Islands
Full-stack development role

work.name: Universidad de La Laguna
work.location: San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Canary Islands, Spain
work.summary: Research intern at the Languages and Computer Systems Group, funded by the Spanish Education Ministry's national university collaboration grant, under the tutelage of PhD Eduardo M. Segredo González and PhD Coromoto A. León Hernández.
highlights: Researched evolutionary algorithms and multi-objective optimization
Developed GeneticsJS, an open-source framework for evolutionary algorithms
Funded by Spanish Education Ministry national collaboration grant
Worked under PhD supervision on software engineering research

awards.title: Extraordinary Award for Academic Performance in Bachelor's Degree
awards.summary: Award obtained for exceptional academic performance in the Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at La Laguna University.

awards.title: Best Project Award - GeneticJS
awards.awarder: Oficina de Software Libre - Universidad de La Laguna
awards.summary: Special award for best project in the local phase of the Spanish University free software contest, given to the project GeneticJS.
